block.p: FLYNN-Henrietta (nee Buck). Age 89. Of Litchfield, CT., born in Conception Harbor, Newfoundland. Formerly of Brooklyn, N.Y. Died suddenly on September 10, 2000. Beloved wife of the late James Bernard. Loving mother of James Bernard, Jr., Ann Marie Crossman and Madeline Patenge. Dear mother-in-law of Julie Maher Flynn, Edgar O. Crossman and David Patenge. Also survived by six grandsons James Bernard III, Michael, Matthew and John Flynn and Robert and Luther Patenge. Visiting Wednesday 2 to 4 and 7 to 9PM at Clavin Funeral Home, 7722 Fourth Ave., Brooklyn. Mass of Christian Burial Thursday, 9:15AM at St. Ephrem's R.C. Church.
